inclusion.criterion: Adults with chronic pancreatitis (as defined by the Cambridge criteria)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refusal to consent for the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: MRI contraindications e.g. pacemaker, artificial heart valve
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous abdominal surgery except appendectomy or hernia repair
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of chronic abdominal pain from causes other than pancreatitis eg. inflammatory bowel or coeliac disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant women (safety concerns from injection of secretin)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients younger than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned. She is an adult and has chronic pancreatitis.
